Name: Eva：Final Mission
About the game: Game introduction Eva: Final Mission is ROGUE's lightly randomly generated action-adventure shooter. The safe zone is breached by the zombie horde, and Agent Eva heads to the virus lab on the other side of the continent with the only remaining samples. There are many dangers along the way, with zombie monsters everywhere blocking the way. You need to collect food, medicine, weapons, survival supplies, rescue survivors, improve survival elements and combat skills, and finally complete the final mission to save the world. Game features Mouse and keyboard classic operation mode, can equip the main weapon and off-hand weapon at the same time. A variety of weapons and equipment, from wooden planks to nuclear mines, from chainsaws to missiles and turrets. Strategic gameplay content, need to always pay attention to the consumption of materials, characters of physical strength, health, hunger value, can not be careless oh. Light form play, you can upgrade bonus points and skill tree. Lightly random battle map, with different routes and random events each time, suitable for repeated play. Rich enemy types, ordinary zombies, elite monsters and powerful bosses to defeat! Well, I hope you get a chance to finish this last assignment with Eva!
